translations.text: When the help comes from Allah, and victory (is granted),<sup foot_note="182876">1</sup>
and you see people entering Allah's religion in multitudes,<sup foot_note="182877">1</sup>
then extol the praise<sup foot_note="182878">1</sup> of your Lord and pray to Him for forgiveness.<sup foot_note="182879">2</sup> For He indeed is ever disposed to accept repentance.
